# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a visual effect view from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Creating a visual effect view

- **init(effect:)**: Creates a new visual effect view with the designated visual effect.
